input.parameter: SELECT b.id_contract, ContractRegistrationNumber, ifnull(a.family,'''')as family, ifnull(a.name,'''')as name, ifnull(a.father,'''')as father , r.RentType ,CAST(CONCAT(IF((ss.SOCR = 'б-р' ) OR (ss.SOCR = 'пр-кт') OR (ss.SOCR = 'пл-ка') OR (ss.SOCR = 'проезд'), ss.SOCR, CONCAT(ss.SOCR, '.')), ' ', ss.NAME, ' д. ' , b.House, IFNULL(IF(b.Flat = '', '',CONCAT(', кв. ' , b.Flat)), ''),IFNULL(IF(rsi.rooms = '', '',CONCAT(', ком. ' , rsi.rooms)), '')) AS CHAR(255)) AS Address from contracts b left join persons a on b.id_contract=a.id_Contract and (a.id_status-1.5)/ABS(a.id_status-1.5)=[pStat] and a.wasDeleted=0 left join sp_renttype r on b.id_RentType=r.id_Rent left join sp_street ss ON b.id_Street = ss.id_street left join rooms_summ_info rsi ON b.id_contract = rsi.id_contract WHERE b.wasDeleted=0 AND ContractRegistrationNumber like '[pReg]' AND ifnull(a.Family,'') LIKE '[pFam]' AND ifnull(a.Name,'') like '[pNam]' AND ifnull(a.Father, '') LIKE '[pFat]' AND ifnull(ss.NAME,'') LIKE '[pStr]' AND ifnull(b.House,'') like '[pHos]' AND IF(b.Flat IS NOT NULL, IF(b.Flat = '', rsi.rooms ,b.Flat), b.Flat) like '[pFlt]' order BY ContractRegistrationNumber
